info.name: Default shader in 1 byte
info.description: I golfed Image to 1 char using variables in Common. Really, this isn't golfing, but it was still fun to do.

renderpass.code: #define W void mainImage(out vec4 c,vec2 p){vec2 u=p/iResolution.xy;vec3 o=.5+.5*cos(iTime+u.xyx+vec3(0,2,4));c=vec4(o,1);}
renderpass.name: Common
